Articles.Content:
Behold, my latest design in aircraft! The Monocruister!

While it is not my fastest design to date, it is considered one of my largest designs yet in terms of aircraft. It contains four landing gears (due to the size of the craft) along with three turbojet engines to keep it powerful enough.

As usual, I'm providing the craft files to this design. One warning about attempting to land this craft is that you will need some fuel if you're distant as this is a much heavier craft and will dive a bit. However, landing works well on this craft if done just right.

I might build another model similar to this with better lift support (earlier aircrafts I built were light enough to keep lift).

Edited September 13, 2012 by Bandock

Thanks Taquarinha.

Yeah, been a while since I posted any new design.

IT think it has a lot of potential but you could make it londer and mybe mount the extra bodies on swept wings!

I am gonna go try that now

I've used swept wings before. They definitely provide a bunch lift.

I was even experimenting with them a while back for a challenge attempt.

Lolz, hope nothing gets sucked into the intakes, hehehehe...

Great design.
